testcase.name: Validate Sort By on Doctor Consult Page
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User clicks on Consult Section.........................................passed Then User navigates on the Consult Page.....................................passed When User clicks on popular cities..........................................passed Then User naviagtes to Doctors Details Page.................................passed When User clicks on sort by Field...........................................passed And User selects Price- Low to High.........................................passed Then Application sorts the doctors list based on price......................passed Then User clicks on Book Hospital Visit Button..............................passed
